Package com.viaoa.jsp

HTML Ajax components and functionality for web page development.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    OAJspComponent
    Interface used for implementing JSP controls.
    OAJspMultipartInterface
    Support for components that submit multipart.
    OATableEditor
    Used by components that can be an OATable column editor.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JspUtil
    Utility class used by JSP components.
    OAApplication
    Application level object.
    OABase
    base class used by OAForm, OASession, OAApplication, for storing objects and messages.
    OAButton
    Used to control an html button show/hide enable ajax submit option forward url
    OACheckBox
    Controls an html input type=checkbox bind to hub, property show/hide, that can be bound to property enabled, that can be bound to property ajax submit on change
    OACombo
    Controls html select+options bind to hub, property set column width show/hide, that can be bound to property enabled, that can be bound to property ajax submit on change handle required validation recursive, displayed using indentation option to set the null description
    OADialog
    Create a dialog out of Html element.
    OAFileInput
    Used to upload a file from a browser form, input file element.
    OAForm
    Controls an html form and it's components Form submission support for multipart messages, errorMessage, hiddenMessages default forwardUrl send script to page (addScript) manage ajax or regular submit calls each component 3 times on submission: before, onSubmit, getReturn js script
    OAGrid
    Grid component that will scroll equal sized cells.
    OAHtmlAttribute
    Used to set the Attribute value of an Html Element.
    OAHtmlElement
    Used to control any html element: hide or show html text: min/max line width, max rows to display click event: ajax or form submit forward URL: to act as a link
    OAImage
    Controls an html img "src" attribute, to use from a property.
    OALink
    Component for managing html links.
    OAList
    Used for an HTML select, with attribute multiple.
    OAListing
    Used with an HTML or to replace the with hub objects.
    OAPassword
    Component for managing html password textfield.
    OARadio
    Controls an html input type=radio bind to hub, property show/hide, that can be bound to property enabled, that can be bound to property ajax submit on change
    OAServletImage
    Controls an html img "src" attribute, to use an image using the ImageSerlvet Example: if image is in object Employee.ImageStore.bytes OAImage(hubEmployee, Employee.P_EmpImageStore); this will change the to use the "/servlet/img" url
    OASession
    Object used by one user session.
    OASystem
    Top component used for managing web server, others include application, user sesssion, page/form.
    OATable
    Ajax table component, supports binding, editors, custom event handling.
    OATableColumn
    Used to add a column to a OATable.
    OATablePager
    OATable page control.
    OATextArea
    TextArea component that can bind html textarea to OA.
    OATextField
    Controls an html input type=text, bind to OA hub, using property path set size, maxwidth show/hide, that can be bound to property enabled, that can be bound to property ajax submit on change handle required validation input mask support for calendar popup

Package com.viaoa.jsp Description

HTML Ajax components and functionality for web page development.
